reviewText: This was a gift for a bedridden family member they wanted Jane Eyre I thought it would be nice for them to have two other movies. So their home health aide doesn't have to keep changing the DVD for another DVD. Well, the home health aide was happy and so was my family member.Great PriceGreat SoundGreat Picture
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: As some other reviewers have already said, there are occasonal problems with the picture and the audio, still for the price this is a good collection.The lead actress in Becoming Jane is perhaps too comely to play Jane Austen, but that is hardly her fault.  The movie is still interesting, especially for an Austen enthusiast.All three movies are well acted and scripted (I would be lynched by my friends if I criticized Jane Eyre), ahd they are well done.  Perhaps if I were willing to pay twice the amount for each movie by itself the  video and audio problems would not exist, but I doubt it.I don't pretend to be a critic of the cinema, all I can say is I enjoyed these movies.  Try it, you'll like it.
summary: Some problems but a good buy.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: The only reason I rated it four stars instead of five is because this DVD was without sub-titles, and occasionally the dialog was a bit difficult to catch.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I did not care for "Becoming Jane" or "Brideshead Revisited."  This version of "Jane Eyre" was only marginal; it lacked the powerful performance seen by Joan Fontaine and Orson Welles ~ perhaps because the actors' perfomances were too subdued.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I purchased these for my husband's mother who is from England.  I like the movies very much.  She likes the movies very very very much.  They are a good British collection.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: These are movies i have seen before i thought some was ok. The other movies on the same dvd was terrible that is a good reason to not buy them together..c.m.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I love good movies and getting a great deal on a multi pack!  These are all really good ones!  Thank you!
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Two movies for Austin that I really enjoyed, well done and great for anyone wanting to write.  Brideshead I didnt like personally, prefer the true stories and less immorality.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: The movies are all done well, but the big problem is they are not captioned, and it was difficult to understand the rapid British speech.  I felt I missed a lot.  Most older people that would like this set of movies would appreciate captioning.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Hmm so much for watching the classics.Not my thing. Anne Hathaway wtf? What did you just say for the last hour? I dunno. The other films werent my cup of tea. On the plus note youll feel like you made an attempt to understand British drama...then your resort to American visually action oriented films. lol
summary: Two Janes for the price of one..
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I should have done some homework before I purchase this dvd. none of these movies really impressed me, which is suprising because generally i enjoy Ann Hathaway
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I enjoyed 'Becoming Jane' and 'Jane Eyre'. I have never seen the actress who played Jane Eyre. The third movie was strange to me.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: We enjoy Miramax productions as a rule and this is a fun way to do so.  We highly recommend this collection.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I love the British movies, tv, sitcoms, everything and this collection adds to my collection. The movies are good and I was very impressed by the picture quality.  Can't beat the price.  Add it to your collection and enjoy.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Each of these films are masterpieces not to be missed.  This is truly a must buy to be enjoyed with someone special.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I love these movies, well acted and with beautiul landscapes and homes and rich characters.that drew you in. These movies will never get old,
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I bought these movies for my wife and she has had many an enjoyable afternoon watch them.  These are good plots and great casts.

reviewText: The only movie on here that I hadn't seen was Brideshead.  It isn't one of my favorite movies now either. The version of Jane Eyre was very nice as was Becoming Jane.

reviewText: We are elderly and need captions.  Can you put us on some kind of *Captions Only list when you make suggestions for us?  Thanks ,
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I sent this dvd back because two of the three movies started playing 1/2 way into the movie.  I tried to hit the back button and go back to the beginning and it was impossible to go back and get the movie to start at the beginning.  I did contact the seller and they allowed me to return it and refunded my money.  I was happy with my treatment by the seller.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I loved re-capturing the class in these older British flicks.  The great price added to the enjoyment. (Just remember that older film quality does not meet current day standards, even when enhanced.)
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Becoming Jane is great with Anne Hathaway portraying Jane Austen well. Maggie Smith matches her in star appeal. Brideshead Revisited is a remade tale that is well told. Story of classes in British society between the two world wars. Jane Eyre is remade pretty well. I just love the story of the governess who makes good, after a torturous childhood.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: This is a wonderful selection of Brit romances, and I am enjoying them immensely. The quality of the films is very good, and I've had no issues with any of the DVDs.If you like Brit romances - this is for you!
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Brideshead revisited made me ill, and this particular version of  Jane Eyre was the worst yet to date. William Hurt is not a fit Edward Rochester, and Becoming Jane was just OK, nothing to get excited about. Really a bad selection, this one, in my humble opinion.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Three in one rocks, these British movies cost a arm and a leg, it is just to wonderful to get three for the price one! Thanks for the rapid delivery too!
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Have enjoyed all the movies even the ones I knew the story content, love different versions of the same story.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I have watched 2 of the 3 movies on here and loved them both. Great value if you are into the historical romany type of movies. I like beening able to get more then one movie on a DVD then I have something new to watch all weekend long.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I loved all the movies in this collection and watch them over and over. Def. recommend this collection to all
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Thought it would be a good buy.  I was wrong!  Only two of the movies play, I cannot get to the others.

reviewText: Classic but current chick flicks, well done and with great stories. Perfect for a "girl's night out" and revisiting over and over.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: What could be better for a lover of Jane Austen then this threesome. I am enjoying it over and over again.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I loved Bridgehead Revisited.  Excellent film and the first of three on the DVD.  I was enraptured with Becoming Jane until the DVD quit working and simply stopped three quarters through the movie.  I bought this DVD in September 2012, then had some personal family problems so was not able to watch it until now.  The DVD is defective but I can't return it because it is past the deadline.  Unfortunate.  The price was excellent but I am disappointed that I can't watch anymore of the DVD.  Sort of like having to leave the theater when a movie that you love is half over.  Sad.
summary: Great Movies if You Can Watch All of Them
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: Jane Austen's  novels always took readers by the heart. Now, the reason is revealed with Ann Hathaway's  compellingly portrayal of the real Jane.  Poor, but outspoken, Jane is an intelligent girl who prefers love above safety. Becoming Jane sets the stage, and the two stories that follow open more windows that expose the emotions that Austen must have felt in her personal search for love..
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: A lover of Brit romance, I was astounded finding such a trove for the pounds. I would do it all over again.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: I absolutely adored "Becoming Jane" which made me feel like I was reliving being in Jane Austen's world. Beautiful setting, costumes and story. Highly recommended."Brideshead Revisited" was also well done - did not enjoy the story as much, but the lavish setting made up for what it was lacking."Jane Eyre" - one of my favorite novels of all time - and a very lovely rendition. Perfect performances and not disappointing in the least - keen attention to detail.All in all a thoroughly enjoyable purchase !!
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre

reviewText: This collection is an excellent choice of British cinema; specially Brideshead revisited. I absolutely recommend it for open minded movies fans.
Title: Miramax British Romance Collection: Becoming Jane/Brideshead Revisited/Jane Eyre
